00007 namespace Bread
00008 {
00012     class cQuaternion
00013     {
00014     public:
00015         cQuaternion() : m_x(0.0f),m_y(0.0f), m_z(0.0f), m_w(1.0f)
00016         {
00017         }
00018         cQuaternion(float x, float y, float z, float w) : m_x(x), m_y(y), m_z(z), m_w(w)
00019         {
00020         }
00021         ~cQuaternion()
00022         {
00023         }
00024 
00025         inline cQuaternion operator * (const cQuaternion& quat) const;
00026         inline cQuaternion operator + (const cQuaternion& quat) const;
00027         inline cQuaternion operator - (const cQuaternion& quat) const;
00028         inline cQuaternion& operator = (const cQuaternion& quat);
00029         inline cQuaternion operator * (float scalar) const;
00030         inline bool operator == (const cQuaternion& quat) const;
00031         inline bool operator != (const cQuaternion& quat) const;
00032         inline cQuaternion operator - () const;
00033         friend cQuaternion operator * (float scalar, const cQuaternion& quat)
00034         {
00035             return cQuaternion(quat.m_x * scalar, quat.m_y * scalar, quat.m_z * scalar, quat.m_w * scalar);
00036         }
00037         
00038         cQuaternion conjuntion() const
00039         {
00040             return cQuaternion(-m_x, -m_y, -m_z, m_w);
00041         }
00042         float norm() const
00043         {
00044             return m_x*m_x + m_y*m_y + m_z*m_z + m_w*m_w;
00045         }
00046         cQuaternion inverse() const
00047         {
00048             float n = norm();
00049             if (n > 0.0f)
00050             {
00051                 float invNorm = 1.0f/n;
00052                 return conjuntion() * invNorm;
00053             }
00054 
00055             return cQuaternion::ZERO;
00056         }
00057         float dot(const cQuaternion& quat) const
00058         {
00059             return m_x*quat.m_x + m_y*quat.m_y + m_z*quat.m_z + m_w*quat.m_w;
00060         }
00061 
00062         cQuaternion exp();
00063         cQuaternion log();

00065 
00066 
00067 
00068 
00069         inline void makeFromRotMatrix(const cMatrix3& mat);

00071

00073     public:
00074         float m_x, m_y, m_z, m_w;

00077         static const cQuaternion IDENTITY;

00079     };
